mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id, su.user_name userName, sm.menu_name menuName, sm.menu_order menuOrder, sm.menu_url menuUrl, sm.parent_menu_id parentMenuId FROM sys_user su, sys_user_role sru, sys_role sr, sys_role_menu srm, sys_menu sm WHERE su.id = sru.sys_user_id AND sru.role_id = sr.id AND sr.id = srm.role_id AND srm.menu_id = sm.id AND su.id = #{userId} and sm.status = 0 ORDER BY (sm.menu_order+0)

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id, sm.menu_name menuName, sm.menu_order menuOrder, sm.menu_url menuUrl, sm.parent_menu_id parentMenuId FROM sys_role sr, sys_role_menu srm, sys_menu sm WHERE sr.id = srm.role_id AND srm.menu_id = sm.id AND sr.id = #{roleId} and sm.status = 0 ORDER BY (sm.menu_order+0)
